channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for IN

item.title: Report X-2023090883
item.description:
Report X-2023090883

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-18T15:12:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-14
  • City: INDIANAPOLIS
  • State: IN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was loaded on the end of the top flaps in the trailer. Trailer door was opened and package dropped to the floor. DescribePack: One glass bottle shattered when package hit the floor. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package placed in hazmat tote, and chemical neutralizer used on floor and swept up.

item.title: Report E-2023100381
item.description:
Report E-2023100381

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-16T18:14:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-14
  • City: FREMONT
  • State: IN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading the warehouse crew accidentally put a forklift fork into one case of printing ink (un1210) damaging one of the inner 6 ounce poly cartridge and releasing 2 ounces of product. The warehouse crew was able to contain and cleanup the release, so no contractors were dispatched.
